actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To suspend temporarily the duty on 3-[(4 Amino-3-Methoxyphenyl) Azo]-benzene sulfonic acid, monosodium salt.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2005, the duty on 3-[(4 Amino-3-Methoxyphenyl) Azo]-benzene sulfonic acid, monosodium salt.

titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on 3-[(4 Amino-3-Methoxyphenyl) Azo]-benzene sulfonic acid, monosodium salt.
